gadget.name: OnTrac Reservations
gadget.description: OnTrac Reservations. Ontrac Reservations gadget keeps you updated with all of your current reservations so that you'll never miss another appointment. OnTrac for the University of Wisconsin - Eau Claire helps you reserve McIntrye Library group rooms to share with the people on your campus. Credits Jeremiah J. Isaacson, Justin Turney, and Jason Van Zanten
